entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Québec
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quebec Lesage Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

Dewpoint: -12.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
